author: SteveL-MSFT
body: In FileSystemProvider.cs we have scripts than handle the file copy and has parameters to support alternate streams which is only supported on NTFS on Windows (due to PInvoke usage).  This code after https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4567 is merged will not be hit, but shouldn't be there to make it more clean.
